text: kohoma wunath me thunkattuwata pin sidda wenna wenadata siripa karuna kalata dakinna nolabena lassana samanala wishesha saha kurulu wishesha daka ganime awasthawak apitath himi wuna.
nansi baha kiwa.
kolambaa inna okkoma kolambain elawanna.
aapu eeye kathawa liyapu kena gana thibune na.
mokada siyak aawath dushanaya karanna bari bawa danna nisa...
tikak nemeyi man hithanne godak.
ape sit ekata issaraha sit eke akka kenek langa hitiya shok babek.eya dan api inna paththa harila hina wenawayi,dulminige athin allanawayi oya wage podi ladaru sin ekakuth patan gaththa.

ee wagema aluthen ape doktarge pothak eli dakinna thiyenanawa kiyalath natyakarayata raha oththuwak labilayi thiyenne.
allannath bari ahu wenneth nathi imakayi eeka thiyenne.......
ohu malasiruru samaga sathun samaga kuda pirimi daruwan samaga pawa lingikawa ekwi atha.
owu naththan muta mallilage, gnyathipuththarayonge lamayinge wedin walatath thaniyama yanna weyi.
wahanayak thibbada kiyalawath kiyanna baha.
eeth akunu walata nam na..

ganwathura galanne na.

anika oyalata watina deyak kawru hari aithi nathi kenek aragena eka eya eyage pawichchiyata gannawanam ethakota tharaha yanawa neda??
apuru sandas kawak...
ithin me chithrapataya paya 1 yi winadi 34 k yanawa.

ohu palamu kek kalla ka dewana kek kallada kanawita wadi wi siti putuwen eka paratama bimata peraluna.
ane na mis ..

warshika saukhya sankhyalekhanaya 2009/2010 bagatha kirima
danata ma usas adhyapanaya labana athara me sandaha siyaluma deshana pawathwenne ingrisi bhashaweni..

emenma eya janamaya washayen athiwana roga thaththwayaki.

emenma me dinayanhidi pudabim thula bimathwa awinithawa ha asanwara lesa hasirimen walaki sitina lesath, mathpan athulu mathdrawya genaeemen ha langa thabaganimen walakina lesath kamituwa bathimath janathawagen wishesha aayachanayak da karayi.“me poson aagamika uthsawa samaya anubudu mihindu himiyan sihipath kerena pinkam sidukerena kalaparichchedayayi.

me weddi apith ekka thawath balawega gananawak me aragalayata ekathu welainnawa. 2010 mahinda rajapaksha janadhipathiwaraya dewani wara path wimen pasu es.bi. disanayakausas adhyapana amathiwaraya wisin malambae paudgalika waidya widyalayata dawantha rajya anuga්rahayak labadenna patan gaththa.
namuth, leda da gannaේ nathiwa inna eka thama wada haොda.
eheth ema radikalun wuwada ingrisiyen
mama ee dennawa me loketa bihi kale ohe atharala dala mage wada karaganna nemeyi.
ehema kalaya kiyala oba amuthu sira minihek/ganiyek/ammek/thaththek wenne na.
kridakayin idiriyata dala mudal ipayima nathara karanna - amathi arjuna pawasayi.

ithin rajjuruwanta badaginne inna bane.
sundara kathandarayak thiyena bawayi penne....

ada dawase fesbuk wani samaja madhya jala nisa (ma wani thawath suwahasak) kar pissanta projekt ekak naganima sulu deyak bawata pathwi atha.

merata bandhanagarawala dadi pidanayakin yuthuwa randawa sitina sirakaruwa saha atham ihalama bandhanagara baladharinge patan sirakaruwa sura kana dushitha niladhari mafiyawe kriyakalapayan hamuwe ratapura bandhanagarawala barapathala thaththwayak nirmanaya wemin thibena bawa kalayaka sitama api ratata handaga kiwemu.

api minissu widihata ipadila inna manussa loke sugathiyak widihata kalpana kalath..
raj wada iwarawela gedara enawa..dora wahala kamareta yanna hareddi sale indan thaththa kathakaranawa ahenawa..

kanna bonna bari wenawa.

aushadhiya katayuthu sandaha minisa wisin kalantharayak thisse sita bhawitha karanu labana shaka wishesha matha kalayedi eewaye aushadhiya gunanga pilibandawa pulul widyathmaka paryeshanayanta lakkara thibe.

nilika ashokata chodana ella nokala ya.
ese nam kawadaka ho dineka minisun wisin me palama idikaranu labannata atha yana mathaya sanatha wanne ya.

rajaye nawa aarthika dakma thula dhanapathi pa්rajathnatha්rawadaya pawa ahosiwana bawata lakunu pahala wemin pawathi.

ekak, dekak thiyenawa ehema liyapu....

eyin igena nogannata nam eya sabawinma parajayaki.
kalu abe inna paththayi dinanne hama thissema.

ee anuwa derata athara pawathi 10 wani wissayi-20 tharagaya jaya gath shri lankawa dakunu aprikawata erehiwa 5 wani jayagrahanaya wartha kirimata samath wu athara dhananjaya da silwa saha dinesh chandimal athara 3 wani kadulla wenuwen pandu 38 kadi thabu lakunu 50ka sabandathawada jayagrahanayata padaka wiya.

mita amatharawa polonnaruwe bithusithuwam uthuru wehera, gal wihara lenwala maki giya chith ra lankathilakaye bithu sithuwam, pothgul wiharaye bithu sithuwam saha shiwa dewalaye bithu sithuwam pawathi athi bawa purawid yagnyayan danata awasheshawa athi chith ra kotas sadhaka thulin penwa de.

andum pilibandawa thama hama mothothakama behewin salakilimath wena namuth siya samiya dhawala mandiraye gatha kala nila kala deka purama ekama kabayakin uthsawa sandaha sahabhagi wu bawa amerika eksath janapadaye hitapu palamu kanthawa sandahan karayi.
ohuge rathri anduma pawa nisi piliwelata andi pijamawaki.
samaharunta anuwa nam lokaye danata bihiwela thiyena adwithiyama parighanakaya thamayi minis molaya wenne.ee kathawe kisima waraddak na.
polis niladhariyek wisin maranna hadapu “misti nayit” (mathaka athi nehki lukya kejna siris eketh hitiya) kellekwa eya beragena thiyenawa.
wenada mama wajira lama niwasayata danayak pirinamanawa.
ada nomanharst giye hari welawata.
aාdaraya kirimata aාkalpamaya sudanama api hadala naha..
apata awashya pa්rajathantha්rawadaya saba purawasi pa්rajathantha්rawadayak dakwa gambauru karannata misa eeniya sanwardhanaye ho jathika aarakshawe namayen eya walala damannata nowe.
apitath honda wade.
athurudahan karana lada ayage gnyathinge nithignyawariyata tharjana (widiyo)
sambandhawa man mage yuthukama thaniyama kara.
si si si wegapanduyawana kridaka nuwan thushara lakunu 32 kata kadulu hatharak dawa gaththeya.
ethakota kopi landan makat eke wikunanda une kunu kolleta.
madakalapuwe sancharayaka niratha wu janadhipathi maitha්ripala sirisena mahatha madakalapuwa mangalarama wiharasthaye nawa wihara mandiraya wiwrutha kirimata welawak
dan teknishan ekek ta katha kala barima thana, thawa...
ada inna yanthara manthara horunge horakame mahatha penwa dima pinisa sarala udaharana kipayakin pamanak nawathiya haki wuwath me lipiye aramuna eeta wada gambaurata kimidimak wetha yama kerehi ya.
baluwe oba ada ma diha pata pili dawata aa nisa...
amathara nalayak sadaha prasampadana katayuthu kara nothibini.
ara wedin walata andina warak karapuwa thamayi 995-1100 ganan walata gaththe.
eeka ithin ajantha ranasinhage waraddak nemeyi...
panahak hatak bara adala dadiyamahansiyen polgedi sayis ekata hadapu chakkek thamayi umbaalata hoda.....
sithath oya wagema lagina lagina thana sapayi kiyala upadanaya karagannawa.
kiri koka wage hitiyata mage haba gathiya penneth math ekka wada karanakota…

mema dakshinanshika maha wyaparika pakshaya balaya gathahoth, karanu aththeda meyamaya. 2002-04 dakwa agamathi lesa wika්ramasinha balaye sitina wita ejapaye welandapala-hithathi ka්riyamargaya wu "yali pubudamu sha්ri lanka” ka්riyawata damamin jiwana mattam gambauru lesa kapa damima wika්ramasinhage adhikshanaya yatathe siduwiya.
warsha 1966di shri sanga bo korayata asunu mihiri gi handaki.
eya saba arthayen gathkala kala paththarayaki.
mahatha ekkena hodata dans karanawa.
hitlar, stalinlath niragamikayo kiyanawa...lokaye palaweni nirgamika rata aljiriyawa...hodata aparadha wela thiyenawa.....

ee anuwa 2011 wasare iseng agaya gananaya kirima sandaha yodagena athi ka්ramawedaya, shishya kandayam dekehi ek ek shishyaya pilibandawa eya balapana aakaraya wena wenama adhyayanaya kota daruwanta paudgalikawa thama lakuna, madhyanyaya, sammatha apagamanaya saha eekabaddha madhyanyaya winiwida bhawayakin yuthuwa balagatha haki aakarayata idiripath kala yuthu bawaya.
ee hasirima thula wu thawath deyak nam sama thanakinma ohu siruwata lissa yamayi.
pahathin wisthara karanne shakthimath, kriyakari, aadaraniya sambandhayakata upakariwana karunukipayak wina nithi paddhathiyak nam newe.
habayi karapu pinkamanan loku deyak malliye.
ee gamana blog liyana kiyawana api hamotama prayojanawath wewi .
bohoma sthuthiyi migara ithihasaya pilimbaanda prashnayak ahuwata.
sama daruwekutama, wisheshayenma yowun daruwekuta thamangema sima mayim thibiya yuthu bawa waidya mathayayi.
enam, papayan piligath ha pirisindu kala hadawathayi.
koheda alkemi ewunge podi ayage idala maha ewwange patan
ayadumpathraya thapal kala wita ayadumpathraya adala sthanayata yama sadaha kalaya boho seyin wadiwe.
api dan koheda inne?
ithin..mama mage kalu sudu blog eke karana ekama wenasa ...me tharam kal ...unna pata pata rosa mala wenuwata wena pinthurayak 2014 di ek kirimayi...

therawadi bududahama aaraksha kirima sandaha buddha shasana amathyanshaya sthapitha kirima saha shasanaye unnathiya sandaha bauddha katayuthu komasaris dhuraya athikirima aadi piyawara rasak ejapa rajaya mangin gath athara sanskruthika urumaya padanam karagath purawidya sthana asurin sancharaka wyaparaya diyunu kirima udesa sanskruthika thrikonaya aarambha karanu labuwe da ejapayayi.
eke kiyala thibenawa “wasara pahaka idiri gamane palamu samarumata aluth ratak wenuwen eka gamanak yannata ek wu garu udaya gammanpila mathithumata gaurawayen aaradhana karamu”.
meka gayana karala sawund klip ekak danna!
lokaye wenath ratawalata erehiwa amarikawa aarthika kumanthranayak diyath kota athi bawata aya karana prakashaya athishayokthiyak bawa sabhawe kenek aata penwa dunneya.
nathi bari aya gana thakimak nathi eka...

diwurum prakasha ha atorni balapathra magin idiripath karana thorathuru sathya bawata thahawuru kirima sandaha adalawana nila lekhana nisi paridi idiripath kala yuthu athara sathyapanaya kirime niladharin sahimata pathwana paridi thahawuru kirime lekhana idiripath nokarana diwurum prakasha ha atorni balapathra sathyapanaya kirimata bharaganima prathikshepa kirimata siduwana bawa karunikawa salakanna.
enam merata janathawata heli kala nohaki karunu gananawak gana agamathi modi samanga eekabaddha wipakshaya sakachcha kala bawayi.
niyamayi ban . ..
dunnu upades walata...
poduwe sama dwarayakma eliye sita arina wita mul piyana dakunata wiwrutha wiya yuthuyi.

wiplawiya wimukthi sanwidhanaya namin handinwunu sanwidhanayaka nayakathwaya daramin koti sanwidhanaya samaga ekwa dakune sannaddha kriyakarakamwala yedunu bawata chodana lada sinhala wamanshikayaku wana mo.la. senewirathnata erehiwa nanga thibunu rajya wirodhi kumanthrana chodana nithipathiwaraya wisin iwath karagena atha.
mage kriyakalapaya gana mama kalpana karami.
mata kiyanna thiyena de mama menna me widihatayi kiwwe.
apata kalahakke kumakda?
